Constructor Detail

ElementMetaData

public ElementMetaData(UniElementDescriptor descriptor,
                       int bufferIndex)
Construct a metadata object from a tuple element descriptor. The caller must provide the index of the element in a tuple's data buffer.

Parameters:
descriptor - the tuple element descriptor
bufferIndex - the byte index in a Tuple's data buffer where the element corresponding to this metadata object begins.
